title: Charles Chase (boxer)
text: Charles Chase (18 February 1931 – 25 February 1997) was a Canadian <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201952%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Light%20middleweight">men's light middleweight</a> event at the <a href="1952%20Summer%20Olympics">1952 Summer Olympics</a>.
